article_title: Life care Family Health and Dental Care fills health gap in Massillon
article_text:
About Lifecare About Lifecare Family Health and...

Lifecare Family Health and Dental Center provides basic primary medical services at its newest location, 820 Amherst Road NE, Massillon. The center, which opened in December, accepts patients of al...

» Read more

article_metadata.description: Lifecare Family Health and Dental Care opened a health center in Massillon in December. The facility offers basic primary medical services to people of all ages, regardless of ability to pay.
article_metadata.author: Amy L. Knapp Independent staff writer
